/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the highway, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. In the distance, power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in many cities. A solitary street lamp stands on the right side of the road, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
